00010 #if !defined(MATRIX_H)
00011 #define MATRIX_H
00012 
00013 #include <sstream>
00014 #include <iomanip>
00015 
00016 #include "Vector.H"
00017 
00018 namespace VecMath {
00024     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Matrix {
00025         public:
00026             Matrix<D, N> ();
00027             Matrix<D, N> (N, N, N, N, N, N);
00028             Matrix<D, N> (unsigned, unsigned, N);
00029             virtual ~Matrix<D, N> () { }
00030             
00035             N &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) { return M[i][j]; }
00036 
00037             Matrix<D, N> operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &) const;
00038             Vector<D, N> operator * (const Vector<D, N> &);
00039 
00040             Matrix<D, N> operator - ();
00041 
00042             std::string Print ();
00043 
00044         protected:
00045             N M[D][D];
00046     };
00047 
00048 
00050     template<unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>::Matrix () {
00051         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00052             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00053                 M[i][j] = 0;
00054             M[i][i] = 1;
00055         }
00056     }
00057 
00065     template <typename N>
00066             Matrix<4, N>::Matrix (N Rxy, N Rxz, N Rxw, N Ryz, N Ryw, N Rzw) {
00067         std::cerr << "Matrix<" << 4 <<">::Matrix<" << 4
00068                   <<"> (Rxy, Rxz, Rxw, Ryz, Ryw, Rzw) not yet implemented!"
00069                   << std::endl;
00070         abort();
00071     }
00072 
00077     template<unsigned D, typename N>
00078             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, N Theta) {
00079         N c = cos (Theta*pi/180.), s = sin (Theta*pi/180.);
00080         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00081             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00082                 M[i][j] = 0;
00083             M[i][i] = 1;
00084         }
00085         M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00086         M[ii][jj] = -s;
00087         M[jj][ii] = s;
00088     }
00089 
00093     template <unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>
00094             Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &B) const {
00095         Matrix<D, N> C;
00096         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00097             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00098                 N s = 0;
00099                 for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00100                     s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00101                 C.M[i][j] = s;
00102             }
00103         return C;
00104     }
00105 
00109     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00110             Vector<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Vector<D, N> &V) {
00111         Vector<D, N> W;
00112         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                              //      i: row
00113             N s = 0;
00114             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                    //      j: col
00115                 s += M[i][j]*V[j];
00116             W[i] = s;
00117         }
00118         return W;
00119     }
00120 
00123     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00124             Matrix<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator - () {
00125         Matrix<D, N> B (*this);
00126         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00127             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00128                 B.M[i][j] = -M[i][j];
00129             }
00130         return B;
00131     }
00132 
00133 
00135     template <unsigned D, typename N> std::string Matrix<D, N>::Print () {
00136         std::ostringstream o;
00137         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00138             o << "|";
00139             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00140                 o << std::setw (10) << std::setprecision (3) << M[i][j];
00141             o << "|\n";
00142         }
00143         o << std::ends;
00144         return o.str ();
00145     }
00146 
00147 }       // namespace VecMath

00149 #endif  // !defined(MATRIX_H)
